description:
go.blog/cmd/blog: remove Server's prefix argument

I added this initially when I thought the Server might be used in
another context. It added unnecessary complexity to the code.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.blog

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5f7f73e1d3e0&repo=blog ***

go.blog/cmd/blog: remove Server's prefix argument

I added this initially when I thought the Server might be used in
another context. It added unnecessary complexity to the code.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
